title: Shorter cuts: Snatch and grab (21/10/04)
abstract: What’s your show? Students script and shoot their own TV show
description: From the ACMI Primary School Program "Snatch and Grab: Shorter Cuts Episode". In the program, Middle Year Students script and shoot scenes for an episode of Shorter Cuts, based on the Burberry Productions TV series Short Cuts. The program was developed in collaboration with Burberry Productions, with assistance from Film Victoria and Seven Network.
